summary: You call this action to get video info after uploading
description: You call this action to get video info after uploading.

query.name: videoId
query.description: the previous return value by calling CompleteCreateVideo

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/media/video/get','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("videoId", "123456")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/media/video/get','GET')
request.add_api_param('videoId', '123456')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

schema.name: result_code
schema.description: error code when the operation fails

schema.name: state
schema.description: possible values: READY_FOR_TRANSCODE, TRANSCODING, TRANSCODE_FAILED, READY_FOR_AUDIT, AUDIT_FAILED, AUDIT_SUCCESS, DELETED

schema.name: result_message
schema.description: error message when the operation fails
